effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Bounce and Fly users.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.
